docs.snippet: MADRID, Oct. 7. -- The government of Premier Alejandro Lerroux, which had provoked a sanguinary uprising by giving Ministerial portfolios to three Catholic Popular Actionists, appeared victorious on all battlefronts tonight and proudly claimed that...
docs.lead_paragraph: MADRID, Oct. 7. -- The government of Premier Alejandro Lerroux, which had provoked a sanguinary uprising by giving Ministerial portfolios to three Catholic Popular Actionists, appeared victorious on all battlefronts tonight and proudly claimed that it had saved the Spanish Republic.
docs.abstract: Catalan officials surrender to Gen Batet; held, with Companys, aboard ship, Uruguay; unofficial estimates of dead, wounded and arrests; Catalan Min of Interior Dencan detained at border; Azana missing, his friend, L Bello, arrested; Syndicalists continue fighting in Barcelona and provinces; general strike continues; demonstrations for Lerroux by Madrid populace, J A Primo de Rivera and his Fascists; Pres Zamora y Torres dismisses P Rico, Madrid Leftist Mayor, and Munic Council; J Martinez de Velasco and governing bd replace them; police seek Caballero; M Cordero, Socialist Deputy, arrested

headline.main: REVOLT IS CRUSHED IN SPAIN; 500 DEAD; BARCELONA YIELDS; Catalonian Rebellion Collapses After Public Buildings Are Shelled by Loyal Troops.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 8. -- Five steamships and fifteen special trains continued today to pour pilgrims to the Eucharistic Congress into Buenos Aires with the city crowded as never before.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 8. -- Five steamships and fifteen special trains continued today to pour pilgrims to the Eucharistic Congress into Buenos Aires with the city crowded as never before.

headline.main: PILGRIMS POURING INTO BUENOS AIRES; Argentine Capital Crowded as Never Before for the Eucharistic Congress. PACELLI TO ARRIVE TODAY Polish Primate and Sarajevo Archbishop Are Greeted by Enthusiastic Throngs.

docs.snippet: BARCELONA, Spain, Oct. 8. -- Full business activity was resumed this morning in Barcelona, which again presented an almost normal aspect except for the presence of soldiers everywhere.
docs.lead_paragraph: BARCELONA, Spain, Oct. 8. -- Full business activity was resumed this morning in Barcelona, which again presented an almost normal aspect except for the presence of soldiers everywhere.

docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 10. -- One of the largest congregations in the history of Christendom gathered around the giant-white cross in a vast outdoor assemblage in beautiful Palermo Park this morning for the opening ceremony of the thirty-second International Eucharistic Congress.

headline.main: 500,000 AT OPENING OF CATHOLIC FETE; Cardinal Pacelli at Eucharistic Congress Urges All of Faith to Pray for Peace. PARK HOLOS VAST THRONG Bishops and Cardinals March in Brilliant Spectacle at Buenos Aires.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Oct. 11. -- The opportunity to confer which the late Viscount Grey of Fallodon vainly tried to give to world statesmen after Sarajevo is already assured here for Monday, less than a week after the Marseilles assassinations.
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Oct. 11. -- The opportunity to confer which the late Viscount Grey of Fallodon vainly tried to give to world statesmen after Sarajevo is already assured here for Monday, less than a week after the Marseilles assassinations.

docs.snippet: TWO dues, two ages, two classes, two philosophies battle for possession of Spain. Prosperous, energetic, industrialized Barcelona is at once the general headquarters and the symbol of the struggle against somber, hungry, hierarchic Madrid, and it is...
docs.lead_paragraph: TWO dues, two ages, two classes, two philosophies battle for possession of Spain. Prosperous, energetic, industrialized Barcelona is at once the general headquarters and the symbol of the struggle against somber, hungry, hierarchic Madrid, and it is a struggle which divides each of the two and every other Spanish city, town and village, within and against itself.
docs.abstract: feature article on Catalans and Castillans as symbols of conflict

headline.main: BEHIND SPAIN'S CONFLICT: THE BASIC ISSUES; Deep Divisions Cut Across All Parts of the Nation; of These Barcelona and Madrid Stand as the Symbols

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 13. -- An imposing military spectacle gave today's program of the Eucharistic Congress a pageantry entirely different from the ceremonies on the three preceding days. The program was devoted to veneration of the Virgin Mary under...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 13. -- An imposing military spectacle gave today's program of the Eucharistic Congress a pageantry entirely different from the ceremonies on the three preceding days. The program was devoted to veneration of the Virgin Mary under the title of Our Lady of Lujan, and it surpassed in magnificence and enthusiasm every thing that had gone before.

headline.main: MILITARY JOINS IN CATHOLIC FETE; Imposing Spectacle Viewed by 500,000 at Eucharistic Congress in Buenos Aires.
